fields.headline: Reports & indicators
fields.bodyText: Reports Today Interims: BSS, CybIT, Detica, Domestic & General, Genemedix, Homeserve, UBC, York Pharma. Finals: Cambridge Antibody Technology, Dawson. Tuesday Interims: Artisan, ASOS, WS Atkins, Computer Software, De La Rue, Genus, Kingston, Redstone, Tangent. Finals: Cardpoint, Compass, Future, Richmond Foods, Topps Tiles. Trading Statement: Barclays, Rentokil. Wednesday Interims: Corus, Focus Solutions, GB Group, IFX Kingfisher (Q3) London Merchant Securities, RPC. Finals: Arla Foods, Daily Mail & General Trust, De Vere Group, Jessops, Mitchells & Butlers, Sage Group, Sarantel Group. Thursday Interims: AWG, Caledonia Investments, Datong Electronics, Dyson, e2v, Findel, FKI, Holidaybreak, Micro Focus, Oasis Healthcare, Plasmon, Reliance Security, United Utilities, VP Group, Wagon, Xansa. Friday Finals: Wolverhampton & Dudley Trading statement: HSBC. Indicators Today Hometrack UK house price survey; CBI annual conference. Tuesday Nationwide house price survey; consumer credit/mortgage lending figures Final: M4 money supply. Wednesday November consumer confidence index. Thursday November CIPS survey; CBI quarterly distributive trades survey. Friday November CIPS construction industry survey; G7 finance ministers and central bank governors meeting begins.
